page.title: 07LOCAL BUILDERS AROUND BRILL.
page.content: Local builders in Brill include John Prosser,Fennel and Blake,Jarmon,I.R. Southam,B.G. and E.Rolfe,Peter Mott and J.Blaine.They do not use local materials.The working hours of Mr. Blaine are 8am. to 5pm.plus occasional saturday mornings.Ten people are builders in Brill.A modern brick costs 10p.Materials are bought from Launton, Bicester,Oxford and Marsh Gibbon. Builders work 50% in Brill and 50% out of Brill.Other local trades include bricklayers,painters,electricians,saw millers,garage mechanics,landscape gardeners,carpenters and plumbers.Other people travel to Oxford,Aylesbury, Bicester and London to work.
